name: RemoveIssueAssignees
description:
Remove assignees from a GitHub issue.

This tool removes one or more assignees from a specified issue in a GitHub repository. Use it when you need to update issue responsibilities and assign different collaborators.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the GitHub repository. This value is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the repository. This is case-insensitive and used to identify the specific repository affected.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: issue_number
parameters.description: The unique number identifying the GitHub issue to modify.

value_schema.description: The number that identifies the issue.

parameters.name: assignees_to_remove
parameters.description: List of usernames to remove as assignees from the issue. Only users with push access will see changes.

value_schema.description: Usernames of assignees to remove from an issue. _NOTE: Only users with push access can remove assignees from an issue. Assignees are silently ignored otherwise._

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repo
parameters.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: issue_number
parameters.description: The number that identifies the issue.

value_schema.description: The number that identifies the issue.

parameters.name: assignees
parameters.description: Usernames of assignees to remove from an issue. _NOTE: Only users with push access can remove assignees from an issue. Assignees are silently ignored otherwise._

value_schema.description: Usernames of assignees to remove from an issue. _NOTE: Only users with push access can remove assignees from an issue. Assignees are silently ignored otherwise._

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
